favourite.article: Just abide, don't do anything else.

How wonderful it is that you have provided all the riches found in the word through the ministry of the age. May the Lord bless His work in you until He returns through the enjoyment of Him through His saints.
Praise God, He put us here! To enjoy Him!
Amen Abiding in the vine! Both God and man are at home now, By the mutual abiding in the vine!
Lord keep us abiding in the life-flow!
Never to leave! Oh we're abiding in the vine!!
We want to be those who abide in the vine!
Now in the life-flow we are living....by abiding in the vine.
I love this song. This song is the best song and to the people that like this song, you should be abiding in the vine all the time. ABIDING IN THE VINE. HOW THE LORD LOVES US SO MUCH!!!
Hallelujah! For He is the Vine and we are the branches ^_^/

Abiding in the vine: John 15:5 All the riches of God's life are mine: Luke 15:11~24 Praise God, He put us here: Genesis 6:18~9:29 vain: Romans 1:21, 1 Corinthians 3:20, 1 Peter 1:18 anointing: 1 John 2:20, 2:27 bestowing: Philippians 2:9 life-flow: John 7:38, ( Revelation 22:1) shines: Matthew 5:15, 16, Luke 1:79, John 1:5, 2 Corinthians 4:6, Philippians 2:15,
Hallelujah! Abiding in the Vine!!
Abiding in the vine...that is what each of our overcomers have to do in Jesus Christ every day...

I was overjoyed to hear this praise-worthy Scripture song, Abiding in the Vine/We've Found The Secret of Living, again. But, here is a 2nd, or alternate, Chorus for you, and my heart SOARS with such JOY when I sing it: "Abiding in the Vine, Abiding in the Vine Love, Joy, Faith, Peace He has made them mine. I have prosperity, power and victory Abiding, Abiding in the Vine!" (Gal. 3:13-14, 29; Dt. 7:28)
Praise the Lord!!! All the riches of God's life are mine.
Simple and upbeat. Thanks for the share.

We should not only be transferred into Christ but most importantly to abide all the time in Him. Abide in Him in our spirit. Hallelujah! Abiding in Him causes us to grow and to spontaneously bear much fruit!!!!!
